q: Which of the following steps do you need to perform when installing an agent?
choices: Start agent registration in the Visual Administrator
Set up an RFC connection to the central monitoring system before the installation

In which subdirectories of sapmnt can you find information about startup problems of an AS Java-based SAP system?
Using standard tp settings, how does the transport strategy 'Queue-Driven Transports, Mass transports' differ from 'Queue-Driven Transports, Single transports'?
choices: Return Code 8 is considered a successful import.
Using the 'Import Request' button causes the imported transport requests to remain in the import queue.
The 'Import All Requests' button is available.
Return Code 16 is caused by an erroneous object in a transport request.
The import process can be scheduled in the background.

q: In which sequence are the profile parameters read from the specified locations by the system?
choices: Start.ini → Kernel → Default profile → Instance profile
Kernel → start.ini → Default profile → Instance profile

q: In which client is the initial set up of TMS done?
When working with Software Update Manager (SUM) you will encounter several input screens. Bring the following input screens into chronological order of appearance.
choices: 4 - Location of stack-XML file → 1 - Password for DDIC → 2 - Parallel processes → 3 - SAP Support Packages
2 - Location of stack-XML file → 3 - Password for DDIC → 4 - Parallel processes → 1 - SAP Support Packages
1 - Location of stack-XML file → 2 - Password for DDIC → 3 - Parallel processes → 4 - SAP Support Packages
3 - Location of stack-XML file → 4 - Password for DDIC → 1 - Parallel processes → 2 - SAP Support Packages

q: You plan to update an AS ABAP-based Quality Assurance System. Which actions might be required before you start SUM?
choices: Follow the instructions in the SAP Notes for the used version of SUM.
Execute the SAP Load Generator (SGEN) transaction for invalid loads.
Import the modification adjustment transports from the update of the "Development System".

q: Which task list can create and index search connectors?
You need to upgrade a SAP HANA system. Which tool do you use?
What preparation steps can you execute well in advance before starting the actual installation of an AS ABAP-based SAP system?
choices: Open a ticket with SAP Support for a license
Identify, download, and read the installation guides

q: Which solutions will enable SAP Fiori applications to be used offline?
choices: SAP HANA Cloud Platform, mobile services

q: When setting up the Transport Management System (TMS), some steps must be performed in a certain sequence. Bring the following activities into the right sequence, regarding the setup of TMS. Arrange these steps into the correct sequence.
choices: 1 - Create a transport domain, 2 - Define the SAP systems of the transport domain, 3 - Create a transport directory, 4 - Configure the Quality Assurance (QA) procedure, 5 - Configure the transport routes

2 - Configure the Quality Assurance (QA) procedure, 4 - Define the SAP systems of the transport domain, 1 - Create a transport domain, 3 - Create a transport directory, 5 - Configure the transport routes

3 - Configure the Quality Assurance (QA) procedure, 1 - Define the SAP systems of the transport domain, 4 - Create a transport domain, 5 - Create a transport directory, 2 - Configure the transport routes

4 - Configure the Quality Assurance (QA) procedure, 3 - Define the SAP systems of the transport domain, 2 - Create a transport domain, 1 - Create a transport directory, 5 - Configure the transport routes

q: How can the system database administrator disable tenant database functionalities?
choices: Using the Manage Restricted Features app
Using the Manage Database Configuration app

q: What happens when you execute a user comparison using transaction PFCG (Role Maintenance) in AS ABAP?
choices: Authorizations in the user master record of two different users are compared.
Profiles are added/deleted from the user master record if required.
Role menus are added to a user master record based on the assigned roles.
Authorization objects are checked to find missing authorizations.

q: Why does SAP HANA have a persistence storage layer that is disk based?
choices: To enable data recovery if the power fails.
To provide an area to unload data when memory is full.
To enable ROW store in the SAP HANA database.
To provide an area to generate indexes for the ROW store.

q: When will the time-based job scheduler be triggered?
choices: Every time the planned start time of a scheduled job is reached.
Every time a job is written to the job scheduling table.
Every time a job has finished.
Every time the value specified by the rdisp/btctime parameter is reached.

q: Which of the following parameters are set on the enqueue server side?
Which of the following technology components for HTTP-based communication can be used together with an SAP S/4HANA system?
choices: SAP Internet Transaction Server (SAP ITS), standalone
SAP Internet Transaction Server (SAP ITS), integrated

q: Business APIs (BAPIs) can be used to trigger and execute transactions in an SAP landscape. Which of the following statements regarding BAPIs are correct?
choices: BAPIs can be used for connecting external software to SAP systems.
Data exchange by BAPI can only be done by asynchronous RFC.
BAPIs are specialized remote function calls.
BAPI communication requires a connection to a central LDAP directory server.

q: In which phase can you revise the parameter values during the SAP Solution Manager system installation?

choices: The user who started the activation
The user who created the repository object

q: Which SAP HANA features ensure that committed data is NOT lost if there is a power failure?
What is the correct parameter replacement sequence in an AS Java-based SAP system (sorted by decreasing priority)?
choices: Instance default → Instance custom → Template default → Template custom
Instance custom → Instance default → Template custom → Template default
Template custom → Instance custom → Template default → Instance default
Template default → Instance default → Template custom → Instance custom

choices: Class C job with a target server
Class A job without a target server
Class A job with a target server
Class C job without a target server

q: During the setup of operation modes, you find a distribution of work processes. Which changes are allowed in the context of operation modes?
choices: Change Job Class A from 0 to 1

In SAP HANA studio on the Trace Configuration tab of the Administration view

q: Which tools can be used to apply SAP Support Packages?

choices: The client transport tool can transfer the same source client simultaneously to multiple SAP systems.
Log files indicating the success of a new client creation are stored in the user’s home directory.
The client copy can be accelerated by using several dialog work processes in parallel.
Customizing and repository objects are automatically copied to the new client.
Remote client copies generate large OS-level files.

q: Which of the following are repository objects in an AS ABAP-based SAP system?

Your business requires data synchronization between one client (source client) in an AS ABAP-based SAP system (source system) and three different clients (target clients) in another SAP system (target system). How do you implement this using RFC technology?
choices: Define three RFC connections to the target clients in the source system.
Define one broadcast RFC connection of type “M” (multiple targets) to the target system.
Define RFC connections between the three clients in the target system.
Define three RFC connections to the source client in the target system.

choices: If the object was created in DEV and transported to QAS via a workbench request.
If the original system of the object is QAS.
If the object was created in DEV and transported to QAS via a transport of copies.

When deciding on the network bandwidth needed to connect front ends to an SAP system (using a WAN connection), you should consider which of the following?

The number of users connecting using this line.
The volume of non-SAP-related traffic (for example, office documents) using the same connection.
Using SAP’s advanced online data compression technology (SAP ODCT) to minimize network load.

When a work process, ICM, or gateway crashes
When a request processing hangs for more than 300 seconds

q: Which operating systems are supported when installing SAP HANA cockpit on IBM Power hardware?

choices: For the ROW tables, the secondary indexes are created during load.
For the COLUMN tables, the primary indexes are created during load.

The ROW store is completely loaded into memory.

q: Which of the following are transport strategies of the Transport Management System (TMS)?

Update secondary SAP HANA system → 2. Perform takeover → 3. Update primary SAP HANA system

q: You are configuring outbound e-mails for an AS ABAP-based SAP system. What can you use to set the default domain?

choices: Safeguard against failure by specifying an alternative spool server.
Provide load balancing for every spool server with an alternative server.
Allow you to configure third-party print servers.
Allow you to centrally set up output devices in several SAP systems.
Allow you to easily transport the print landscapes.

q: Which prerequisites apply when you perform an SAP HANA database copy of a single-tenant system?
choices: The version of the target database is the same or higher than the source.
The restore point in time of the target database is the same or earlier than the source.
The number of nodes on the target database is the same or lower than the source.
The number and type of services on the target database can be different from the source.

q: Which of the following statements are correct for packages in the context of development and transport?
choices: A repository object can be assigned to several packages.
Repository objects can be assigned to a package.
Customizing objects can be assigned to a package.
A package can be assigned to a transport layer.
A package can be assigned to a software component.

choices: Log files created by the transport tools before the tp tool moves them to the <transport directory>/log directory

q: While you are monitoring a spool request in AS ABAP, the status <F5> is displayed. What does this status mean?
choices: There is more than one output request and at least two requests have a different status.
The request has been passed to an output device and a final status has NOT been returned.
The spool request has NOT yet been processed by the host spool system.
The spool request has been processed by the host spool system and is waiting to be archived.
